summary: Web application with navigation hierarchy featuring a Client Portal (including Compliance) and Admin menu (including Compliance Admin).
architectural_notes: Navigation hierarchy: Compliance is nested under Client Portal; Compliance Admin is nested under Admin menu.

existing_features.title: In the Navigation component, move the 'Compliance' link so it appears as a nested item under the 'Client Portal' section (visible to authenticated, approved users). It should no longer appear as a top-level navigation item.

In the Navigation component, move the 'Compliance Admin' link so it appears as a nested item under the 'Admin' menu section (visible to admin users only). It should no longer appear as a top-level navigation item.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update navigation hierarchy: place Compliance within Client Portal and Compliance Admin within Admin menu
